name: @akashic/akashic-cli-export-html
description: A module to convert your Akashic game to a runnable standalone.

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build && node ./build-template-support/checkAkashicVersions
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf lib && shx rm -rf spec/build
scripts.build: npm run build:app && npm run build:export && npm run build:templates && shx cp ./templates/engineFilesVersion.json ./lib
scripts.build:export: npm run build:export:tsc && npm run build:export:copy
scripts.build:export:copy: npm run build:export:copy:v2 && npm run build:export:copy:v1
scripts.build:export:copy:v2: shx mkdir -p templates-build/v2/js && shx cp -r tmp/export/build templates-build/v2/js
scripts.build:export:copy:v1: shx mkdir -p templates-build/v1/js && shx cp -r tmp/export/build templates-build/v1/js
scripts.build:templates: npm run build:template:v1 && npm run build:template:v2 && npm run build:template:ejs
scripts.build:template:v1: cd templates/template-export-html-v1 && npm install && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:template:v2: cd templates/template-export-html-v2 && npm install && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:template:ejs: shx cp templates/bundle-index.ejs templates-build/ && shx cp templates/no-bundle-index.ejs templates-build/
scripts.test: npm run test:jest && npm run lint
scripts.update-template: npm run update-template:v1 && npm run update-template:v2 && node ./build-template-support/updateEngineFiles.js
scripts.update-template:v1: node ./build-template-support/generateAkashicVersionsFile v1 && cd templates/template-export-html-v1 && npm run update && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.update-template:v2: node ./build-template-support/generateAkashicVersionsFile v2 && cd templates/template-export-html-v2 && npm run update && npm run build && cd ../../

author: DWANGO Co., Ltd.
